items.title: ICE Data Reveals What Happened to 1,600 People Arrested During Chicago’s Blitz
items.description: Most of those arrested were swiftly shuttled to a sprawling array of detention centers in 13 states, many with reports of troubling conditions.

items.title: The St. Louis Jails Are Running Out of Officers
items.description: Too many detainees and too few staff have pushed the City Justice Center and County Jail to a breaking point.

items.title: We Spent a Year Covering Deaths Behind Bars. Here’s What We Learned.
items.description: Every year, thousands of people die in prisons, jails and law enforcement custody.

items.title: Some of Our Best Work of 2025
items.description: Online, in print, and on radio and TV — we examined Trump administration orders, immigration detention, deaths behind bars and more this year.

items.title: ICE Threw Thousands of Kids in Detention, Many For Longer Than Court-Prescribed Limit
items.description: Former immigration staffers argue ICE is choosing to detain families for prolonged periods to speed deportations and compel them to leave.
